summary: The client inquired whether US-4 should be implemented alone or paired with another item in the sprint. Alex recommended pairing US-4 with US-5 for session management to create a cohesive authentication module, ensuring end-to-end testing and maximizing value, while asking about other potential sprint items.

risks.risk: Implementing US-4 alone may lead to partial authentication flows without end-to-end testing
risks.mitigation: Pair US-4 with US-5 (session management) to build a cohesive auth module
